title: chat banned
body: i just got a chat ban who decided the odd one out in the four man would be funny to ban him so they all did? so sweet ok but now i cant even get loot or anything from playing the game howlong does it take to get back? the privalige to get loot beacause u were banned for being the odd one out of a four man squad lol

replies.body: Also i did report one of the players, but im sure nothing happened to them.

How are you sure? You only get a notification when your report triggers a punishment by the Instant Feedback System; not getting it doesn't mean your report won't contribute to it later. And why did you report only one of them when you're saying they were all a problem? They can't get punished if they aren't reported.

because this toxic crap is so frequent people like myself can't be bothered spending 5-10mins after each game reporting people.

It's a system that rewards whinging, one of which i haven't done until i've been on the receiving end.
It's takes all of 2 seconds to report a player. If you need to leave a description it doesn't have to be a novel.

Remember that high road? Most of the more mature players just move on and don't bother, leaving the petty whingers to stack the reports against people like it's valid. 

The system is broken and needs an overhaul, it's not fair atm and suits toxic whingers more than legitimate concerns.

If you consider the "high road" to be not reporting players you think should be punished, that's your own fault that they don't get punished. Only one report is needed to flag their match to be checked.

The time is variable depending on your punishment (10 chat being the least) and whether you show reform or not. You can read more about that here; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/57wOcrmh-if-you-are-ineligible-for-hextech-loot-read-here-for-info-on-becoming-eligible-again

As for being punished due to a 4-man group, Riot has negated the power of premade reports to only count as one so this isn't the case. On top of that, you aren't going to be punished if you did nothing wrong. If you'd share your reform card I'd be happy to go over it with you.

(The appropriate board for this would be **Player Behaviour**, though)

> Sure i swore

Swearing isn't the issue, it's abusing other players or otherwise creating a negative environment. If they are causing problems for you, don't feed it, mute and report them. I suggest reading the following articles for guidelines on being a sportsmanlike player;

[The Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/)
[Behavior Worthy of a Champion](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751874)

> next time i feel liek being angry, ill just politely troll so others swear and i can report them

That's a great way to skip chat restrictions and get banned. If you want to discuss your punishment I'd suggest posting your chat logs provided from your in-client reform card. If you think you were wronged by the system and punished by error then you need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll manually review your case.

Logs already gone, go ahead and just look up and review the game i was chat banned from.

Go nuts, tell me what they did wouldn't frustrate you also.

THere is nothing to encourage positive play, the negative environment regardless of if it was "Verbal" or not, was provided by them, i just typed it.

So their actions can't be stopped, but mine can cause its in a text log.

Stupid system, you just look at the end, not the means to it. 

I can't goback and look at it, you know what... I do have a little honored badge, i do promote good behavior in the community, but when people are so toxic it frustrates you, do you think people like myself are going to just stay silent whilst some shit head kid ruins our fun? And says were wrong and the system you have in place supports them, not us. 

So yeah at present, i really dont care what the code is, others dont, OCE is a toxic community and will always be. Until you start punishing the causes and not the people who bite at it. You will always have jaded people like me playing (though probably not for long, i think its time the kids just have their kid toys and move on) frustrated that your system supports the kids automatically and by the time you actually help people like myself its far too late.

> Logs already gone, go ahead and just look up and review the game i was chat banned from.

I'm not a Rioter, just a volunteer. I can't look up your matches. If you deleted the email already you can request them again through a ticket if you want, but without you providing them I can't go over them with you.

> THere is nothing to encourage positive play, the negative environment regardless of if it was "Verbal" or not, was provided by them, i just typed it.

Each person is responsible for their own actions. They can't make you do anything and you can't make them do something, so you are judged according to what you alone did. If they got away with it today that doesn't mean they will never be punished. Even if your report against them didn't result in a punishment now it will still contribute to their case to be reviewed later if they are consistently toxic. The only reason you got punished now is because you had a history of negative behavior being reported and wasn't just from this match alone.

> So their actions can't be stopped, but mine can cause its in a text log.

Gameplay offenses are more severely punished. When they cross the line and get caught they will receive bans is warranted, not chat restrictions.

> do you think people like myself are going to just stay silent whilst some shit head kid ruins our fun

You should. They are just shit head kids, so ignore them and don't stoop to their shit head level please. Otherwise all you do is make sure the shit head environment gets shittier and stays that way.

>  i really dont care what the code is

That is why you got punished. You need to start caring, and when you start taking the high road your gaming experience will improve as a result.
